name: OBEXFileTransferServices
desc: Implements advanced OBEX operations in addition to simple PUT and GET.

items.name: func changeCurrentFolderBackward() -> OBEXError
items.desc: Change to the directory above the current level if not at the root

items.name: func changeCurrentFolderToRoot() -> OBEXError
items.desc: Asynchronously change to the remote root directory

items.name: func connectToFTPService() -> OBEXError
items.desc: Connect to a remote device for FTP operations

items.name: func connectToObjectPushService() -> OBEXError
items.desc: Connect to a remote device for ObjectPush operations. Most of the FTP functionality of this object will be disabled.

items.name: func copyRemoteFile(String!, toLocalPath: String!) -> OBEXError
items.desc: Copy a remote file to a local path

items.name: func createFolder(String!) -> OBEXError
items.desc: Create a folder on the remote target

items.name: func currentPath() -> String!
items.desc: Get the remote current directory path during an FTP session

items.name: func getDefaultVCard(String!) -> OBEXError
items.desc: Get the remote default VCard, if it is supported

items.name: func isBusy() -> Bool
items.desc: Get the action state of the module

items.name: func isConnected() -> Bool
items.desc: Get the connected state of this module.

items.name: func send(Data!, type: String!, name: String!) -> OBEXError
items.desc: Send data to a remote target

items.name: func sendFile(String!) -> OBEXError
items.desc: Put a local file to the remote target
